atk-abh03a62:1_0: Dukadukapaṭṭhānepi hetusahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayāti pañhuddhāravaseneva saṅkhepato desanā katā.
atk-abh03a62:1_1: Tattha hetudukaṁ sahetukadukādīhi, sahetukadukādīni ca tena saddhiṁ yojitāni.
atk-abh03a62:1_2: Ekekaṁ pana dukaṁ sesehi, sesā ca tehi saddhiṁ paṭipāṭiyā yojetabbā.
atk-abh03a62:1_3: Idañhi dukadukapaṭṭhānaṁ nāma ‘dukesuyeva duke pakkhipitvā’ desitaṁ.
atk-abh03a62:1_4: Tenettha sabbadukehi saddhiṁ sabbadukānaṁ yojanā veditabbā. Pāḷi pana saṅkhittā.
atk-abh03a62:1_5: Yena yena ca padena saddhiṁ yaṁ yaṁ padaṁ yojanaṁ na gacchati, taṁ taṁ hāpetvāva desanā katāti.
atk-abh03a62:8_2: Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṁ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṁ anulomapaṭṭhānaṁyeva veditabbaṁ.
